Text: Request: the crack for 1.32 full version.
Is this cracked version? Otherwise I don't see the point of it being here.

looks like no crack is needed - mount the .iso in daemon tools, run the .exe found on the disk. update runs successfully, game loads and says it's v1.32, old save game works...

haven't played for long - there's a coupla new roads on the map I noticed, including the A27 from Southampton -> Dover. I like this, as I live very close to the A27!
